miro_pcl Documentation

miro_pcl

The miro_pcl package

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/miro_pcl

miro_pcl is a modification to the standard ROS package for pcl. It subscribes to the point cloud obtained from miro and performs basic steps like filtering and downsampling. Additionally it also tries to stitch multiple point clouds using Registration principle.
